3.0.name: wordpress/user-and-document-monitoring
3.0.description:
There is a git repo of this plugin, which might have more development in process then the final version here. so you may test that also at , https://github.com/hiteshjoshi/client-document-monitoring

This plugin helps in managing document and users more easily and effectively.Features :-
*You can create users more faster than wordpress default user system.
*You can upload documents and can assign to different users.
*Users can login and download/view their document.
*Everything AJAX based.

More information at http://hiteshjoshi.com/wordpress/client_document_monitoring.html
Click here to donate and support this plugin
